File_Description: Data package level readme. Contains data package summary; acknowledgements; and contact information.
Data dictionary that defines column and row headers across all tabular data files (files ending in ".csv" or ".tsv") in the data package.
Standard: ESS-DIVE FLMD v1; ESS-DIVE CSV v1

File_Description: File-level metadata that lists and describes all of the files contained in the data package.
Standard: ESS-DIVE FLMD v1; ESS-DIVE CSV v1

File_Description: Modeled median grain size (d50; Gomez-Velez et al.; 2015) and annual amount of oxygen respiration in the HZ via vertical and lateral hyporheic exchange between the stream and the HZ, respectively (Son et al.; 2022).
Standard: ESS-DIVE Hydrologic Monitoring v1; ESS-DIVE CSV v1

File_Description: Water column respiration, sediment respiration, total ecosystem respiration, and gross primary production for sites across the Yakima River Basin. Total ecosystem and gross primary production can also be found in the model outputs; they are duplicated here for streamlined use of the respiration data.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Hydrologic Monitoring v1; ESS-DIVE CSV v1

File_Description: Description of methods associated with installation/deployment of sensors. Required by ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Hydrologic Monitoring (Goldman et al. 2021).
Standard: ESS-DIVE Hydrologic Monitoring v1; ESS-DIVE CSV v1

File_Description: Figure from the manucript in pdf format. The asterisk (*) indicates the figure number and a short descriptor of the figure.
Figure from the manucript in png format. The asterisk (*) indicates the figure number and a short descriptor of the figure.
Intermediate file used to create a final figure using Illustrator. The asterisk (*) indicates a short descriptor of the figure.
Q-GIS project used to create figure 6.
Shapefile of the United States downloaded from the Census (https://www.census.gov/geographies/mapping-files/time-series/geo/carto-boundary-file.html). The asterisk refers to the file extension.

Shapefile for the Columbia River Basin clusters downloaded from Laan et al. (2025). The asterisk refers to the file extension. Due to the file size of the .shp file it is not included in the GitHub repository but can be located in the ESS-DIVE Data Package.

Shapefile of the Columbia River Basin. Data were downloaded from USGS National Hydrography Dataset 2019 (https://www.usgs.gov/national-hydrography/national-hydrography-dataset). The asterisk refers to the file extension.

Shapefile of rivers within the Yakima River Basin (YRB). Data were downloaded from USGS National Hydrography Dataset 2019 (https://www.usgs.gov/national-hydrography/national-hydrography-dataset).  The asterisk refers to the file extension.

Shapefile of the Yakima River Basin (YRB) boundary. Data were downloaded from https://ecology.wa.gov/research-data/data-resources/geographic-information-systems-gis/data. The asterisk refers to the file extension.
Shapefile of data from "CB_catchments_clean_joined.*" subsetted to the Yakima River Basin (YRB). The asterisk refers to the file extension.
Readme file directing the user to where to download the published data used in analyses. Users will need to download the published data to rerun the scripts.
R script used to calculate water column respiration and sediment respiration.
R script used to process published data from Son et al. (2022) into the units needed for our analyses.
R script used to create the stream metabolizer inputs files.
Readme file describing all of the steps in the Create_SM_Input_Files.R script.
R script used to preform LASSO analysis.
R script used to create the figures for the manuscript.
R script used to create the maps for the figures in the manuscript.
R-project file used for running StreamMetabolizer.
Histogram plots of the outputs from StreamMetabolizer. The asterisk (*) indicates the Parent_ID and Site_ID seperated by an underscore.
Gas exchange (k600) estimated from hydrologic parameters using emperical relationships. Input file for the streamMetabolizer model.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Hydrologic Monitoring v1; ESS-DIVE CSV v1

File_Description: Measured and modeled hydraulic conditions (velocity; slope; depth; and discharge). Input file to calculate K600 estimates (v*_SSS_K600.csv).
Standard: ESS-DIVE Hydrologic Monitoring v1; ESS-DIVE CSV v1

File_Description: Approximately 35 days of 1-minute time-series data (temperature; dissolved oxygen; pressure; depth) collected using miniDOT and HOBO depth sensor. Depth was calculated (see data file header rows and installation methods file for more details). Depth and Pressure are measured/calculated with 15-minute resolution so the same value is repeated 15 times to upsample to 1-minute resolution. Input file for the streamMetabolizer model. The asterisk (*) indicates the version and Parent_ID.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Hydrologic Monitoring v1; ESS-DIVE CSV v1

File_Description: Plot showing sensor time-series input data. The asterisk (*) indicates the version and Parent_ID.
Combined results of streamMetabolizer model for all sites.

Daily mean results from stream metabolizer. Includes mean, standard deviation, and distribution stats for ER, GPP, and K600. Also includes daily fit statistics. The asterisk (*) indicates the version, Parent_ID, and Site_ID seperated by underscores.
Model-time-resolution (15 minute) input values and model predictions for dissolved oxygen. The asterisk (*) indicates the version, Parent_ID, and Site_ID seperated by underscores.
Model-time-resolution (15 minute) observation error and process error statistics. The asterisk (*) indicates the version, Parent_ID, and Site_ID seperated by underscores.
Observation error and process error statistics for the complete study period. The asterisk (*) indicates the version, Parent_ID, and Site_ID seperated by underscores.

R markdown report containing the complete model run; including input plots; model performance metrics; and output plots. The asterisk (*) indicates the version, Parent_ID, and Site_ID seperated by underscores.
R markdown script for calculating gas exchange (K600) estimates (v*_SSS_K600.csv).
R markdown script for combining and summarizing streamMetabolizer model results.
R markdown script for the streamMetabolizer model.
R script that loops each site through the streamMetabolizer model.
